DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , open-labeled , randomize , control , multicenter study two clinical investigative site Tucson , Arizona . The subject undergo intraocular pressure measurement CATS tonometer prism Goldmann applanation tonometer prism ( GAT ) . Fifty ( 50 ) Subjects 18 old enrol . Subjects screen base standard care vision examination clinical investigation site . All subject undergo standard ophthalmic exam inform consent . IOP measure use Goldmann tonometer armature standard flat GAT prism modify curved CATS prism alternately insert . The additional measurement central corneal thickness ( CCT ) use correct one corneal biomechanical error see GAT prism currently standard care .
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent ( assent applicable ) obtain subject subject 's legal representative ability subject comply requirement study . Male female patient , least 18 year age Subject undergone ocular surgery within last 3 month Uncontrolled systemic disease opinion Investigator would put subject 's heath risk Pregnant nursing woman Subjects one functional eye Those one eye poor eccentric fixation Eyes display oval contact image Those corneal scar corneal surgery include corneal laser surgery Microphthalmos Buphthalmos Contact lens wearer Severe Dry eye Lid squeezer blepharospasm Nystagmus Keratoconus Any corneal conjunctival pathology infection .
